title: Simplify Dashboard Create Lease Listing to Only Require ID, Lease Code, and Split Ratio

requirements.text: Update the Dashboard "Create Lease Listing" / "Edit Lease Listing" dialog (frontend/src/components/dashboard/LeaseOfferEditorDialog.tsx) so the only user-input required fields are: Listing ID, Lease Code (UUID string), and Split Ratio (NLO/ULO, e.g., 60/40). Remove Location, Area, and Capacity from the required validation and from the primary form UI (they may be omitted entirely or moved into an optional/advanced section that is not required to submit).

quotes: for  the create lease listing in the dashboard login the only fields required are : listing id, lease code and split ratio

acceptanceCriteria: Creating a listing from the dashboard succeeds when only Listing ID + Lease Code + Split Ratio are provided by the user (no Location/Area/Capacity input required).
The form no longer blocks submission with the error "Please fill in all required fields" due to missing Location/Area/Capacity.
User-facing labels and helper text remain in English.

requirements.text: Ensure the dashboard create/update listing mutations still send valid values to the existing backend API even when Location/Area/Capacity are not entered by the user, by automatically supplying safe defaults in the dialog submit handler (e.g., Location="Unspecified", Area=0, Capacity=0) while preserving the user-entered Listing ID, Lease Code, and Split Ratio.

quotes: for  the create lease listing in the dashboard login the only fields required are : listing id, lease code and split ratio

acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the simplified form calls the existing actor methods (createLeaseListing/updateLeaseListing) without backend validation/trap errors due to missing Location/Area/Capacity.
Lease Code UUID validation still works (invalid UUIDs are rejected with a clear inline error).
Split Ratio validation still works (invalid ratios are rejected with a clear inline error).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components instead).
Maintain the single-actor backend architecture; no additional backend canisters/services.
nonGoals: Fixing or changing the Internet Identity login flow (not requested in the latest message).
Changing the backend Candid/API signatures for createLeaseListing/updateLeaseListing.
